addAssemblyPart.AddAssemblyPart_Switch: Click here to switch to the 'Add Assembly' or 'Convert Part to Assembly' form.
addAssemblyPart.AddAssemblyPart_BOMNumber: Please enter your Bill of Materials (BOM) number.
addAssemblyPart.AddAssemblyPart_AssemblyPartNumber: Please enter your Assembly Part number.
addAssemblyPart.AddAssemblyPart_AssemblyPartName: Please enter the name of your Assembly Part.
addAssemblyPart.AddAssemblyPart_Description: Please provide a description for your Assembly Part.
addAssemblyPart.AddAssemblyPart_ECNNumber: Please enter your Engineering Change Notice (ECN) number.
addAssemblyPart.AddAssemblyPart_RevisionNumber: Please enter the Revision number for your Assembly Part.
addAssemblyPart.AddAssemblyPart_DrawingNumber: Please enter the Drawing number for your Assembly Part.
addAssemblyPart.AddAssemblyPart_ProductGroup_container: Please select the Product (Code) from the dropdown.
addAssemblyPart.AddAssemblyPart_TechnologyId_container: Please select the Technology from the dropdown.
addAssemblyPart.AddAssemblyPart_EffectiveDate: Please select the Effective Date for your Assembly Part.
addAssemblyPart.AssemblyPart_Add_BOM: Click here to add more child parts.
addAssemblyPart.AddAssemblyPart_Remark: Add any necessary remarks for your Assembly Part.
addAssemblyPart.AddAssemblyPart_UploadFiles: Attach any necessary files for your Assembly Part.
addAssemblyPart.AddAssemblyPart_Cancel: Click here to cancel and exit the form.
addAssemblyPart.AddAssemblyPart_Save: Click here to Save your Assembly Part information.

addProductPart.AddIndivisualPart_Description: Please provide a description for your Product.
